data.eml:eml: Description of four new species of Burrowing Frogs in the Fejervarya rufescens complex (Dicroglossidae) with notes on morphological affinities of Fejervarya species in the Western Ghats

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Garg, Sonali, Biju, S. D. (2017): Description of four new species of Burrowing Frogs in the Fejervarya rufescens complex (Dicroglossidae) with notes on morphological affinities of Fejervarya species in the Western Ghats. Zootaxa 4277 (4): 451-490, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4277.4.1
